籤詩版本二:
Ke hele nei ma ka hapalua o ke kuahiwi komohana, ʻaʻole hiki ke hoʻopaʻa ʻia nā pali o Junling.
Ke nānā nei i luna i ke Akua no ka palekana, aia nō kēia kino i loko o ka hale morgue
詩意:
Ua like kēia hexagram e ʻimi ana i ke gula ma ke one.
Aia nā hōʻailona o ka poʻe hanohano ma nā mea a pau.

Eia kekahi: Hōʻike kēia hexagram i ka pilikia o ke kanaka.
Aia nā hōʻailona o ka poʻe hanohano ma nā mea a pau.
解曰:
Hiki ke loaʻa iā Jade ma ke kālai pōhaku. E huli i ke gula ma ke one. Pono e hana ikaika. Pilikia wale.
ʻO kekahi hana: kahi kūlana paʻakikī. ʻAʻohe wahi e noho ai. E noi i ka hoʻomaikaʻi ʻana i ke Akua. E pule no ka maluhia o ka naau.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Nahu gula a ʻimi i nā ana o lalo
No ka hoʻolauleʻa ʻana i kāna hana koa, ua mālama ʻo Cheng Yaojin i kahi ʻahaʻaina ma Yanwuyang. Ua hāmama koke aʻela kekahi puka i loko o ka lepo, ʻaʻole hiki ke ʻike ʻia, hailona nā kānaka a pau ma ka ʻohi ʻana i nā huaʻōlelo, nahu ke gula i lanakila, a me ka hoʻolimalima ʻana i nā kaula e nakinaki ai i loko o ka lua.
Aia nā puka pōhaku, nā papaʻaina, nā noho, nā alahaka, a me nā mea ʻē aʻe, aia ma luna o ka pākaukau nā ʻaʻahu deragona a me nā kāʻei jade, i hana ʻia me ke gula a kahiko ʻia i waho o ke ana.
Ua puka mai ʻo Yao Jin mai loko mai o ka lua me kahi pahu nui a me kahi pahu liʻiliʻi, wehe i ka pahu lāʻau a lawe i ka sila jade, wehe i ka pahu, lawe i ka hae nui, ka lei aliʻi a me nā alahele a kau i ka papaʻaina, a me nā mea a pau. nana lakou pakahi. Ua ʻike au i nā mea sila ʻewalu i kahakaha ʻia ma ka sila nui ʻo "The Demon King of Hunshi, the Great Virtuous Emperor".
Ua hoʻomana nā kānaka a pau iā ia ma ke ʻano he "Emperor", a ua hana ʻo Yaojin i kēia no ʻekolu makahiki ma ke ʻano he Demon King. (ʻOiaʻiʻo, ua hoʻolaha wale ʻia kēia, a ʻo Cheng Yaojin wale nō ke alakaʻi o ke kauhale i kēlā manawa.)
(He ʻōlelo hoʻohālikelike kēia moʻolelo i nā mea maikaʻi e like me ka hana keaka.
聖意: ʻO ka pule no ka home a me ka hale, hoʻohewa iā ʻoe iho, ʻimi waiwai, hana ikaika, makaʻala i ka ʻoihana, e keakea ʻia ka male ʻana e Liu Jiaxu, poʻe hele wāwae, Chi Tian, ​​​​silkworms, paʻa ʻeono holoholona, ​​ʻimi i nā kānaka, ʻaʻohe hihia, nalowale. , ka neʻe ʻana, ka mālama ʻana i ka waiwai nalowale, nā maʻi ʻino, nā pilikia, nā mauna a me nā lua kupapaʻu.
古人: Ke 'imi 'ana i ka Crypt for Gold
